title: can I added a friend from other region?
body: {{summoner:1}} can I added a friend from other region? for example , I'm (north America) can I add my friend from (eu west) ? and how it will be?

replies.body: When you connect to the chat server, you're connecting to a network specific to that region.  It won't be possible to add a friend who is on another region.  Hope that helps clear things up, but let me know if you have any questions!
Every region is separate so you won't be able to add a friend playing on a different server.
